name: OpenPEPPOL AISBL
membership:
'Observer' type membership held in EESPA - European e-Invoicing Service Providers Association
http://eespa.eu/
goal: To enable businesses to communicate electronically with any European government institution in the procurement process, increasing efficiencies and reducing costs.
interests: Digital economy and society, Research and innovation, Trans-European Networks
euInitiatives: European Norm, eIDAS, eProcurement Directives, CEF eDelivery, CEF eProcurement, CEF eInvoicing initiatives.
